  • OS: x86/x86_64
  • Processor: 1Ghz
  • Memory: 1 GB RAM
  • Storage: 1 GB available space

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 7
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Any with 1024 Mb VRAM and DX10 support
  • DirectX: Version 10
  • Storage: 500 MB available space
  • Additional Notes: Use 16:9 or 16:10 monitors for better game experience

name: Megadimension Neptunia VIIR 四女神オンライン スターター 武器セット

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 7, 32bit, 64bit
  • Processor: Intel i5 2.3 GHz or equivalent
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Graphics card with 1GB VRAM or more and compatibility with Direct X 11.0 or higher
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 9 GB available space
  • Sound Card: Direct Sound compatible sound card
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows 10 64bit
  • Processor: Intel i5 3.3 GHz
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce GTX 960、ATI Mobility Radeon R9 290 or greater
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 9 GB available space
  • Sound Card: Direct Sound compatible sound card

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 7 / 8.1 / 10 (64bit)
  • Processor: Intel i5 4460 / AMD FX8300
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GTX 750TI / AMD(ATI) Radeon HD 5870
  • Storage: 469 MB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows 7 / 8.1 / 10 (64bit)
  • Processor: Intel i7 4790 / AMD Ryzen 5 1500X
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GTX 1060 / AMD Radeon R9 390
  • Storage: 469 MB available space

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows® 8 (32/64-bit)/Windows® 7 (32/64-bit)/Vista
  • Processor: Dual Core Processor
  • Memory: 1 GB RAM
  • Graphics: 128MB Video Card with OpenGL support
  • Storage: 370 MB available space

Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: WINDOWS® 7, 8, 8.1, 10 (64-BIT Required)
  • Processor: Intel® Core™ i5-4460, 2.70GHz or AMD FX™-6300 or better
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA® GeForce® GTX 760 or AMD Radeon™ R7 260x with 2GB Video RAM
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 7900 MB available space
  • Additional Notes: Hardware specification target 4K/30FPS. May require reduction in Texture Quality settings or turning Texture streaming to OFF due to high VRAM requirements.
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: WINDOWS® 7, 8, 8.1, 10 (64-BIT Required)
  • Processor: Intel® Core™ i7 3770 3.4GHz or AMD equivalent or better
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA® GeForce® GTX 1060 with 3GB VRAM
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 8100 MB available space
  • Additional Notes: Hardware specification target 4K/30FPS.

  • DirectX: Version 9.0c

  • Processor: Core 2 Duo E6600(2.4 Ghz)

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 7 or higher 64-bit
  • Processor: Intel Core 2 Duo 2GHz, AMD Athlon 64 X2 2GHz
  • Memory: 6 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GT 750 Ti 2 GB or AMD RADEON HD 7850 2 GB
  • DirectX: Version 10
  • Storage: 10 GB available space
  • Sound Card: DirectX compatible Sound Card with latest drivers
  • Additional Notes: This game needs all Windows updates installed.
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 7 or higher 64-bit
  • Processor: Quad-core Intel or AMD processor, 2.5 GHz or faster
  • Memory: 6 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GTX 970 or AMD RADEON R9 390X
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 10 GB available space
  • Sound Card: DirectX compatible Sound Card with latest drivers
  • Additional Notes: Headphones & SSD Recommended

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 7
  • Processor: Intel Core 2 or AMD equivalent
  • Memory: 1 GB RAM
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 200 MB available space
  • Additional Notes: Network Bandwidth of 5Mbps for 540p, 3Mbps for 360p.
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: Intel Core I3+ or AMD equivalent recommended for HD 1080p playback
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 500 MB available space
  • Additional Notes: Network Bandwidth of 12Mbps for 1080p or 8Mbps for 720p.
